content.div:
Fans of The Jersey Shore's most musically inclined member will be getting a whole lot more access to the tanned, gelled and highlighted one as Pauly D's Jersey Shore spinoff, The Pauly D Project, has an official premiere date in Canada.

MTV Canada has confirmed to Dose.ca that the innovatively named project will air March 29 at 10:30 p.m. ET, following the return of Punk'd at 10 p.m.

According to EW.com, The Pauly D Project will follow Mr. DelVecchio as he pursues his dream of being a professional DJ, signing a record deal with 50 Cent's G-Note Records as well as opening for Britney Spears on her Femme Fatale tour.

The Jersey Shore is set to air its Season 5 finale on March 15 followed by a reunion show a week later.

jond@dose.ca

entry.title: Jersey Shore Top 10 Unforgettable Pop Culture Moments

link.Abstract: As the show enters its fifth season, we take a look at ten of the most unforgettable pop culture moments featuring the cast of Jersey Shore.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: It was not long ago that a young group of orange-faced guidos and guidettes blind sighted the world with their oddly entrancing Gym, Tan, Laundry lifestyle and odd disfiguring of the English language. Since that fateful day in 2009, the phenomenon that is The Jersey Shore has stretched far beyond the beaches of the Garden State, launching its stars into the mainstream consciousness and beyond. As the show enters its fifth season, we take a look at ten of the most unforgettable pop culture moments featuring the cast of Jersey Shore.
link.title: Jersey Shore Gallery 1

link.Abstract: Beavis and Butt-Head return to save the youth of today from more things that suck; namely their parent company, MTV.
link.title: Beavis and Butt-Head Are Back To Save Teens from Snooki!

link.Abstract: This week, we tackled the T of GTL and put seven sunless tanners to the test. See which ones gave us a natural glow and which ones left us looking like Oompa-Loompas.
link.title: Beauty Buy or Beware: Self Tanner
